entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
